entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
